item.title: NU
item.description: score:-12 Chances: Nu Holdings’ expected increase in second-quarter 2023 revenues could positively impact the stock. Partnership with Hopper to power Nubank’s travel portal could lead to growth in customer engagement. Surpassing 80 million customers in Brazil and Latin America indicates strong customer base expansion.
